title: The.Amazing.Spider-Man.2012.720p.BluRay.(Optimised for PS3)
description:
Runtime: 136 min
Language: English
Director: Marc Webb.
Writer: James Vanderbilt, Alvin Sargent, Steve Kloves, James Vanderbilt, Stan Lee, Steve Ditko.
Cast: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans, Denis Leary, Martin Sheen, Sally Field, Irrfan Khan, Campbell Scott, Embeth Davidtz, Chris Zylka.
Link: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0948470/

MKV's do not work natively on PS3 so this has been given the SM10 touch. Converted to MPEG2 and re-synced to accommodate that change and configured a few filters to maximise colour on those bigger screens.
